   20: -module(io_proto_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([setopts_getopts/1,unicode_options/1,unicode_options_gen/1, 
   26: 	 binary_options/1, read_modes_gl/1,
   27: 	 read_modes_ogl/1, broken_unicode/1,eof_on_pipe/1,
   28:          unicode_prompt/1, shell_slogan/1, raw_stdout/1, raw_stdout_isatty/1,
   29:          file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1, file_read_stdin_list_mode/1,
   30:          io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode/1,
   31:          io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1,
   32:          file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode/1,
   33:          file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode/1,
   34:          io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode/1
   35:         ]).
   36: 
   37: 
   38: -export([io_server_proxy/1,start_io_server_proxy/0, proxy_getall/1, 
   39: 	 proxy_setnext/2, proxy_quit/1]).
   40: %% For spawn
   41: -export([answering_machine1/3, answering_machine2/3]).
   42: 
   43: -export([uprompt/1, slogan/0, session_slogan/0]).
   44: 
   45: -export([write_raw_to_stdout/0, read_raw_from_stdin/1]).
   46: 
   47: %%-define(debug, true).
   48: 
   49: -ifdef(debug).
   50: -define(dbg(Data),io:format(standard_error, "DBG: ~p\r\n",[Data])).
   51: -else.
   52: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
   53: -endif.
   54: 
   55: suite() ->
   56:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   57:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   58: 
   59: all() -> 
   60:     [setopts_getopts, unicode_options, unicode_options_gen,
   61:      binary_options, read_modes_gl, read_modes_ogl,
   62:      broken_unicode, eof_on_pipe, unicode_prompt,
   63:      shell_slogan, raw_stdout, raw_stdout_isatty,
   64:      file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   65:      file_read_stdin_list_mode,
   66:      io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode,
   67:      io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode,
   68:      io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   69:      file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode,
   70:      file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode,
   71:      io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode
   72:     ].
   73: 
   74: groups() -> 
   75:     [].
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
   79:     os:putenv("TERM","vt100"),
   80:     DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
   81:     [{default_shell,DefShell},{term, Term}|Config].
   82: 
   83: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   84:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
   85:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
   86:     ok.
   87: 
   88: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   89:     Config.
   90: 
   91: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   92:     Config.
   93: 
   94: -record(state, {
   95:                 q = [],
   96:                 nxt = eof,
   97:                 mode = list
   98:                }).
   99: 
  100: uprompt(_L) ->
  101:     [1050,1072,1082,1074,1086,32,1077,32,85,110,105,99,111,100,101,32,63].
  102: 
  103: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  104: unicode_prompt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  106:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  107: 	new ->
  108: 	    rtnode:run(
  109:               [{putline,""},
  110:                {putline, "2."},
  111:                {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  112:                {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  113:                {expect, "[\n ]default"},
  114:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  115:                {putline, "hej"},
  116:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  117:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  118:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  119:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  120:                {putline, "hej"},
  121:                {expect,"[\n ]hej"},
  122:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  123:               ],[],"",["-pa",PA]);
  124:         _ ->
  125:             ok
  126:     end,
  127:     %% And one with oldshell
  128:     rtnode:run(
  129:       [{putline,""},
  130:        {putline, "2."},
  131:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  132:        {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  133:        {expect, "default"},
  134:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  135:        {putline, "hej"},
  136:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  137:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  138:        {expect, "[\n ]\\?*ok"},
  139:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  140:        {putline, "hej"},
  141:        {expect,"[\n ]\\?*hej"},
  142:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  143:       ],[],"",["-oldshell","-pa",PA]),
  144:     ok.
  145: 
  146: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  147: shell_slogan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  148:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  149:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  150: 	new ->
  151: 	    rtnode:run(
  152:               [{expect, "\\Q"++string:trim(erlang:system_info(system_version))++"\\E"},
  153:                {expect, "\\Q"++io_lib:format("Eshell V~s (press Ctrl+G to abort, type help(). for help)",[erlang:system_info(version)])++"\\E"}
  154:               ],[],"",[]),
  155:       	    rtnode:run(
  156:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  157:                {expect, "\nTest session slogan \\("}
  158:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","\"Test slogan\"",
  159:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","\"Test session slogan\""]),
  160:       	    rtnode:run(
  161:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  162:                {expect, "\\Q\nTest session slogan (\\E"}
  163:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:slogan/0",
  164:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:session_slogan/0",
  165:                        "-pa",PA]);
  166:         _ ->
  167:             ok
  168:     end.
  169: 
  170: slogan() ->
  171:     "Test slogan".
  172: session_slogan() ->
  173:     "Test session slogan".
  174: 
  175: %% Check io:setopts and io:getopts functions.
  176: setopts_getopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177:     FileName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  178: 			      "io_proto_SUITE_setopts_getopts.dat"]),
  179:     {ok,WFile} = file:open(FileName,[write]),
  180:     Server = start_io_server_proxy(),
  181:     [{binary, false}] = io:getopts(Server),
  182:     [getopts] = proxy_getall(Server),
  183:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(WFile)),
  184:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  185:     "Hej" = io:get_line(Server,''),
  186:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  187:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_line(Server,''),
  188:     ok = io:setopts(Server,[{binary,true}]),
  189:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  190:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  191:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  192:     <<72,101,106,200,148>> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  193:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts",[<<72,101,106,200,148>>])),
  194:     file:write(WFile,<<"HejA">>),
  195:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,unicode)),
  196:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,big})),
  197:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,little})),
  198:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,big})),
  199:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,little})),
  200:     file:close(WFile),
  201:     {ok,RFile} = file:open(FileName,[read]),
  202:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  203:     [$H,$e,$j,$A] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  204:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  205:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  206:     [{binary,false},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  207:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  208:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  209:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  210: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  211:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  212:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  213:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  214: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  215:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  216:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  217:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  218: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  219:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  220:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  221:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  222: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  223:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  224:     file:position(RFile,0),
  225:     io:setopts(RFile,[{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}]),
  226:     <<$H,$e,$j,$A>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  227:     [{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  228:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  229:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  230:     [{binary,true},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  231:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  232:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  233:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  234: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  235:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  236:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  237:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  238: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  239:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  240:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  241:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  242: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  243:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  244:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  245:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  246: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  247:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  248:     file:close(RFile),
  249:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  250: 	new ->
  251: 	    %% So, lets test another node with new interactive shell
  252: 	    rtnode:run(
  253:               [{putline,""},
  254:                {putline, "2."},
  255:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  256:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  257:                {expect, "{binary,false}"},
  258:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  259:                {putline, "hej"},
  260:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  261:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  262:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  263:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  264:                {putline, "hej"},
  265:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  266:               ],[]);
  267:         _ ->
  268:             ok
  269:     end,
  270:     %% And one with oldshell
  271:     rtnode:run(
  272:       [{putline,""},
  273:        {putline, "2."},
  274:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  275:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  276:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
  277:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  278:        {putline, "hej"},
  279:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  280:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  281:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  282:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  283:        {putline, "hej"},
  284:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  285:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
  286:     ok.
  287: 
  288: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  289: file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  290:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  291: 
  292:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  293:     {ok, "got: <<\"abc\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  294:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  295:     {ok, "got: <<\"def\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  296:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  297:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  298: 
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  302: file_read_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  303:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  304: 
  305:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  306:     {ok, "got: \"abc\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  307:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  308:     {ok, "got: \"def\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  309:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  310:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  311: 
  312:     ok.
  313: 
  314: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  315: io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  316:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  317:                          fun() ->
  318:                                  case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  319:                                      eof -> eof;
  320:                                      Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  321:                                  end
  322:                          end, [binary]),
  323: 
  324:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  325:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  326:     {ok, "got: <<\"\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  327:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  328:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  329: 
  330:     ok.
  331: 
  332: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  333: io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  334:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  335:                          fun() -> case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  336:                                       eof -> eof;
  337:                                       Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  338:                                   end
  339:                          end, [list]),
  340: 
  341:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  342:     {ok, "got: \"x\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  343:     {ok, "got: \"\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  344:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  345:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  346: 
  347:     ok.
  348: 
  349: %% Test that mixing io:get_chars and file:read works when stdin is in binary mode.
  350: io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  351:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  352:                          fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 1) of
  353:                                       eof -> eof;
  354:                                       {ok, Chars} ->
  355:                                           case io:get_line(standard_io, "") of
  356:                                               eof -> Chars;
  357:                                               Line ->
  358:                                                   {ok, [Chars, Line]}
  359:                                           end
  360:                                   end
  361:                          end, [binary]),
  362: 
  363:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "1\n"),
  364:     {ok, "got: [<<\"1\">>,<<\"\\n\">>]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  365:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  366:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  367: 
  368:     ok.
  369: 
  370: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  371: file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  372:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  373:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  374:                          [binary],
  375:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  376: 
  377:     %% Invalid utf8
  378:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  379: 
  380:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  381:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  382:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  383:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  384:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  385: 
  386:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  387:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  388:                          [binary],
  389:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  390: 
  391:     %% Valid utf8
  392:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  393: 
  394:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  395:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  396:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  397:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  398:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  399: 
  400:     %% Setting using io:setopts used to hang on Windows, see #7459 for details.
  401:     {ok, P3, ErlPort3} = start_stdin_node(
  402:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  403:                          [binary],
  404:                          "-eval \"io:setopts([{encoding, latin1}])\""),
  405: 
  406:     %% Invalid utf8
  407:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort3, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  408: 
  409:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  410:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  411:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  412:     ErlPort3 ! {self(), close},
  413:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  414: 
  415:     ok.
  416: 
  417: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  418: file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode(_Config) ->
  419:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  420:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  421:                          [list],
  422:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  423: 
  424:     %% Invalid utf8
  425:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  426: 
  427:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  428:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  429:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  430:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  431:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  432: 
  433:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  434:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  435:                          [list],
  436:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  437: 
  438:     %% Valid utf8
  439:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  440: 
  441:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  442:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  443:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  444:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  445:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  446: 
  447:     ok.
  448: 
  449: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is not utf8,
  450: %% but unicode is printed out
  451: io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode(_Config) ->
  452:     {ok, P, ErlPort} =
  453:         start_stdin_node(
  454:           fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 5) of
  455:                        {ok, Chars} ->
  456:                            %% We've read a unicode string as latin1,
  457:                            %% which means that if we convert it to
  458:                            %% a binary it will be seen as the original
  459:                            %% unicode string.
  460:                            io:format("~ts",[list_to_binary(Chars)]),
  461:                            {ok, Chars};
  462:                        Else ->
  463:                            Else
  464:                    end
  465:           end,
  466:           [list],
  467:           "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  468: 
  469:     %% Valid utf8
  470:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"duπa"/utf8>>),
  471: 
  472:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  473:     receive
  474:         {ErlPort, {data, Data}} ->
  475:             %% On stdout any unicode should be translated to hex syntax
  476:             "du\\x{3C0}a" = Data
  477:     end,
  478: 
  479:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  480:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  481: 
  482:     ok.
  483: 
  484: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions) ->
  485:     start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, "").
  486: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, ExtraArgs) ->
  487:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{active, false},{packet,4}]),
  488:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  489:     Cmd = lists:append(
  490:             [ct:get_progname(),
  491:              " -noshell ",
  492:              ExtraArgs,
  493:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  494:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " read_raw_from_stdin ", integer_to_list(Port)]),
  495:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
  496:     ErlPort = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof, stderr_to_stdout]),
  497:     {ok, P} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  498:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(IoOptions)),
  499:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(ReadFun)),
  500:     {ok, P, ErlPort}.
  501: 
  502: read_raw_from_stdin([Port]) ->
  503:     try
  504:         {ok, P} = gen_tcp:connect(localhost, list_to_integer(atom_to_list(Port)),
  505:                                   [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
  506:         {ok, OptionsBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  507:         io:setopts(standard_io, binary_to_term(OptionsBin)),
  508:         {ok, ReadFunBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  509:         spawn(fun() ->
  510:                       gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  511:                       init:stop("crash")
  512:               end),
  513:         read_raw_from_stdin(binary_to_term(ReadFunBin), P)
  514:     catch E:R:ST ->
  515:             io:format(standard_error, "~p  ~p",[Port,{E,R,ST}])
  516:     end.
  517: read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P) ->
  518:     case ReadFun() of
  519:         eof ->
  520:             gen_tcp:send(P, "got: eof"),
  521:             init:stop();
  522:         {ok, Char} ->
  523:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  524:                               io_lib:format("got: ~p\n",[Char]))),
  525:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  526:         {ok, Fmt, Char} ->
  527:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  528:                               io_lib:format("got: "++Fmt++"\n",[Char]))),
  529:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P)
  530:     end.
  531: 
  532: get_lc_ctype() ->
  533:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  534: 	{{unix,sunos},{5,N,_}} when N =< 8 ->
  535: 	    "iso_8859_1";
  536: 	_ ->
  537: 	    "ISO-8859-1"
  538:     end.
  539: 
  540: %% Test various unicode options.
  541: unicode_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  542:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  543:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  544:     %% A string in both russian and greek characters, which is present
  545:     %% in all the internal test files (but in different formats of course)...
  546:     TestData = [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  547: 		1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  548: 		1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  549: 		32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  550: 		963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963],
  551:     %% Testdata from Chinese open source customer, that triggered OTP-7974
  552:     TestData2 = [46,46,46,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,
  553: 		 12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,
  554: 		 12411,12370,44,44,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,12411,12370,12411,
  555: 		 12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,
  556: 		 12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,44,10],
  557: 
  558:     %% The external test files are generated with a BOM writing
  559:     %% text editor. A shorter line is written (with two characters 
  560:     %% larger than 127).
  561:     ExternalTestData = [197,116,101,114,101,114,246,118,114,97],
  562:     InternalBomFiles = ["testdata_utf8_bom.dat",
  563: 			"testdata_utf16_big_bom.dat",
  564: 			"testdata_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  565: 			"testdata_utf32_big_bom.dat",
  566: 			"testdata_utf32_little_bom.dat"],
  567:     AllNoBom = [{utf8,"testdata_utf8.dat"},
  568: 		{utf16,"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  569: 		{{utf16,big},"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  570: 		{{utf16,little},"testdata_utf16_little.dat"},
  571: 		{utf32,"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  572: 		{{utf32,big},"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  573: 		{{utf32,little},"testdata_utf32_little.dat"}],
  574:     ExternalBomFiles = ["external_utf8_bom.dat",
  575: 			"external_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  576: 			"external_utf16_big_bom.dat"],
  577:     ReadBomFile = fun(File,Dir) ->
  578: 			  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  579: 					     [read,binary]),
  580: 			  {ok,Bin} = file:read(F,4),
  581: 			  {Type,Bytes} = unicode:bom_to_encoding(Bin),
  582: 			  file:position(F,Bytes),
  583: 			  io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Type}]),
  584: 			  R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  585: 				io:get_chars(F,'',length(TestData)),unicode),
  586: 			  file:close(F),
  587: 			  R
  588: 		  end,
  589:     ReadBomlessFile = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  590: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  591: 						 [read,binary,
  592: 						  {encoding,Type}]),
  593: 			      R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  594: 				    io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),unicode),
  595: 			      file:close(F),
  596: 			      R
  597: 		      end,
  598:     ReadBomlessFileList = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  599: 				  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  600: 						     [read,
  601: 						      {encoding,Type}]),
  602: 				  R = io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),
  603: 				  file:close(F),
  604: 				  R
  605: 			  end,
  606:     ReadBomlessFileListLine = fun({Type,File},Dir) ->
  607: 				      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  608: 							 [read,
  609: 							  {encoding,Type}]),
  610: 				      R = io:get_line(F,''),
  611: 				      file:close(F),
  612: 				      R
  613: 			      end,
  614:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- InternalBomFiles ],
  615:     [ExternalTestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- ExternalBomFiles ],
  616:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  617:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  618:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  619:

  621:     BomlessDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMLESSDATA"]),
  622:     file:make_dir(BomDir),
  623:     file:make_dir(BomlessDir),
  624: 
  625:     WriteBomFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  626: 			   {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  627: 					      [write,binary]),
  628: 			   file:write(F,unicode:encoding_to_bom(Enc)),
  629: 			   io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Enc}]),
  630: 			   io:put_chars(F,TestData),
  631: 			   file:close(F),
  632: 			   ok
  633: 		   end,
  634:     [ ok = WriteBomFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  635:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,BomDir) || {_,F} <- AllNoBom ],
  636:     WriteBomlessFile = fun({Enc,File},TData,Dir) ->
  637: 			       {ok,F} = file:open(
  638: 					  filename:join([Dir,File]),
  639: 					  [write,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  640: 			       io:put_chars(F,TData),
  641: 			       file:close(F),
  642: 			       ok
  643: 		       end,
  644:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  645:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  646:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  647:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  648: 
  649:     CannotReadFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  650: 			     %%io:format(standard_error,"~s\r\n",[filename:join([Dir,File])]),
  651: 			     {ok,F} = file:open(
  652: 					filename:join([Dir,File]),
  653: 					[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  654: 			     Enc2 = case Enc of
  655: 					utf8 ->
  656: 					    unicode;
  657: 					Tpl when is_tuple(Tpl) ->
  658: 					    Tpl;
  659: 					Atom when is_atom(Atom) ->
  660: 					    {Atom, big}
  661: 				    end,
  662: 			     {error, {no_translation,Enc2,latin1}} = 
  663: 				 file:read(F,10),
  664: 			     {error,terminated} = io:get_chars(F,'',10),
  665: 			     ok
  666: 		     end,
  667:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  668:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  669:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  670: 
  671:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData2,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  672:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  673:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  674:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  675: 
  676: 
  677:     FailDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"FAIL"]),
  678:     file:make_dir(FailDir),
  679: 
  680:     CannotWriteFile = fun({_Enc,File},Dir) ->
  681: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(
  682: 					 filename:join([Dir,File]),
  683: 					 [write,binary]),
  684: 			      {'EXIT', {no_translation,_}} =
  685: 				  (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  686: 			      {'EXIT', {terminated,_}} = (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  687: 			      ok
  688: 		      end,
  689:     [ ok = CannotWriteFile(F,FailDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  690: 
  691:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  692: 	new ->
  693: 	    %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  694: 	    rtnode:run(
  695:               [{putline,""},
  696:                {putline, "2."},
  697:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  698:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  699:                {expect, "{encoding,latin1}"},
  700:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  701:                {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  702:                {putline, "io:setopts([unicode])."},
  703:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  704:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  705:                {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  706:               ],[],"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]);
  707:         _ ->
  708:             ok
  709:     end,
  710:     rtnode:run(
  711:       [{putline,""},
  712:        {putline, "2."},
  713:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  714:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  715:        {expect, "[\n ]{encoding,latin1}"},
  716:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  717:        {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  718:        {putline, "io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."},
  719:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  720:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  721:        {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  722:       ],[],"",
  723:       ["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
  724:     ok.
  725: 
  726: %% Tests various unicode options on random generated files.
  727: unicode_options_gen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  728:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a alot of time
  729:     rand:seed(default),
  730:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  731:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  732:     AllModes = [utf8,utf16,{utf16,big},{utf16,little},
  733: 		utf32,{utf32,big},{utf32,little}],
  734:     FSize = 9*1024,
  735:     NumItersRead = 2,
  736:     NumItersWrite = 2,
  737:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "GENDATA1"),
  738:     file:make_dir(Dir),
  739: 
  740:     DoOneFile1 =
  741: 	fun(Encoding, N, M) ->
  742: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  743: 		io:format("Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  744: 		io:format(standard_error,
  745: 			  "Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  746: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  747: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  748: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  749: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  750: 		Bin = unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist, utf8, Encoding),
  751: 		ok = file:write_file(Fname, Bin),
  752: 
  753: 		Read1 = fun(FD) -> io:get_line(FD, '') end,
  754: 		Res1 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  755: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  756: 				       Read1),
  757: 
  758: 		Read2 = fun(FD) -> io:get_chars(FD, '', M) end,
  759: 		Res2 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  760: 				       [read,binary,
  761: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  762: 				       Read2),
  763: 
  764: 		Read3 = fun(FD) ->
  765: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  766: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  767: 				    Other -> Other end
  768: 			end,
  769: 		Res3 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  770: 				       [read,binary,
  771: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  772: 				       Read3),
  773: 
  774: 		Read4 = fun(FD) ->
  775: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  776: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  777: 				    Other -> Other end
  778: 			end,
  779: 		Res4 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  780: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  781: 				       Read4),
  782: 
  783: 		Ulist2 = [X || X <- Ulist, X =/= $\n, X =/= $\s, X =/= $\t],
  784: 		Ulist = done(Res1),
  785: 		Ulist = done(Res2),
  786: 		Ulist2 = done(Res3),
  787: 		Ulist2 = done(Res4),
  788: 
  789: 		file:delete(Fname)
  790: 	end,
  791:     [ [ [ DoOneFile1(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  792: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  793: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersRead) ],
  794: 
  795:     DoOneFile2 =
  796: 	fun(Encoding,N,M) ->
  797: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  798: 		io:format("Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  799: 		io:format(standard_error,
  800: 			  "Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  801: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  802: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  803: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  804: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  805: 
  806: 		Res1 = write_read_file(Fname, 1,
  807: 				       [write],
  808: 				       Encoding,
  809: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  810: 
  811: 		Res2 = write_read_file(Fname, 2,
  812: 				       [write,binary],
  813: 				       Encoding,
  814: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  815: 
  816: 		Fun3 = fun(FD) ->
  817: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~tc", [C]) || C <- Ulist],
  818: 			       ok
  819: 		       end,
  820: 		Res3 = write_read_file(Fname, 3,
  821: 				       [write],
  822: 				       Encoding,
  823: 				       Fun3),
  824: 
  825: 		Fun4 = fun(FD) ->
  826: 			       io:put_chars(FD,
  827: 					    unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist))
  828: 		       end,
  829: 		Res4 = write_read_file(Fname, 4,
  830: 				       [write],
  831: 				       Encoding,
  832: 				       Fun4),
  833: 
  834: 		LL = string:tokens(Ulist, "\n"),
  835: 		Fun5 = fun(FD) ->
  836: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~ts", [L]) || L <- LL],
  837: 			       ok
  838: 		       end,
  839: 		Res5 = write_read_file(Fname, 5,
  840: 				       [write],
  841: 				       Encoding,
  842: 				       Fun5),
  843: 
  844: 		Ulist2 = lists:flatten(LL),
  845: 		ResBin = done(Res1),
  846: 		ResBin = done(Res2),
  847: 		ResBin = done(Res3),
  848: 		ResBin = done(Res4),
  849: 		Ulist = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin, Encoding),
  850: 
  851: 		ResBin2 = done(Res5),
  852: 		Ulist2 = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin2, Encoding),
  853: 
  854: 		ok
  855: 	end,
  856:     [ [ [ DoOneFile2(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  857: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  858: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersWrite) ],
  859:     ok.
  860: 
  861: read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
  862:     do(fun() ->
  863: 	       do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun)
  864:        end).
  865: 
  866: do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
  867:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, Options),
  868:     Res = do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F),
  869:     ok = file:close(F),
  870:     unicode:characters_to_list(Res, unicode).
  871: 
  872: do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F) ->
  873:     case Fun(F) of
  874: 	eof ->
  875: 	    [];
  876: 	{error,Error} ->
  877: 	    receive after 10000 -> ok end,
  878: 	    exit(Error);
  879: 	Other ->
  880: 	    [Other|do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F)]
  881:     end.
  882: 
  883: write_read_file(Fname0, N, Options, Enc, Writer) ->
  884:     Fname = Fname0 ++ "_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  885:     do(fun() ->
  886: 	       do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Enc, Writer)
  887:        end).
  888: 
  889: do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Encoding, Writer) ->
  890:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, [{encoding,Encoding}|Options]),
  891:     Writer(F),
  892:     ok = file:close(F),
  893:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Fname),
  894:     ok = file:delete(Fname),
  895:     Bin.
  896: 
  897: enc2str(Atom) when is_atom(Atom) ->
  898:     atom_to_list(Atom);
  899: enc2str({A1,A2}) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
  900:     atom_to_list(A1)++"_"++atom_to_list(A2).
  901: 
  902: 
  903: random_unicode(0) ->
  904:     %% io:fread(Device, Promp, "~ts") will return an error if the file
  905:     %% ends with whitespace characters. This behavior seems to be
  906:     %% deliberate. Therefore, be sure that we never end the file with
  907:     %% a sequence of whitespace characters.
  908:     [$! + rand:uniform(64) |
  909:      case rand:uniform(20) of
  910:          A when A =< 1 -> [$\n];
  911:          _ -> []
  912:      end];
  913: random_unicode(N) ->
  914:     %% Favor large unicode code points and make line breaks.
  915:     X = case rand:uniform(20) of
  916: 	    A when A =< 1 -> $\n;
  917: 	    A when A =< 3 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF);
  918: 	    A when A =< 6 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7F) + 16#7F;
  919: 	    A when A =< 12 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7FF) + 16#7FF;
  920: 	    _ -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#FFFF) + 16#FFFF
  921: 	end,
  922:     if
  923:         X =:= $\r;                            %Can be eaten by io:get_line/2.
  924:         16#D800 =< X, X =< 16#DFFF;
  925:         X =:= 16#FFFE;
  926:         X =:= 16#FFFF ->
  927: 	    random_unicode(N);
  928: 	true ->
  929: 	    [X | random_unicode(N-1)]
  930:     end.
  931: 
  932: 
  933: %% Test variants with binary option.
  934: binary_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  935:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  936:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  937:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(
  938: 		 [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  939: 		  1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  940: 		  1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  941: 		  32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  942: 		  963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963]),
  943:     <<First10:10/binary,Second10:10/binary,_/binary>> = TestData,
  944:     First10List = binary_to_list(First10),
  945:     Second10List = binary_to_list(Second10),
  946:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir, "testdata_utf8.dat"]),
  947:     {ok, F} = file:open(TestFile,[read]),
  948:     {ok, First10List} = file:read(F,10),
  949:     io:setopts(F,[binary]),
  950:     {ok, Second10} = file:read(F,10),
  951:     file:close(F),
  952:     {ok, F2} = file:open(TestFile,[read,binary]),
  953:     {ok, First10} = file:read(F2,10),
  954:     io:setopts(F2,[list]),
  955:     {ok, Second10List} = file:read(F2,10),
  956:     file:position(F2,0),
  957:     First10List = io:get_chars(F2,'',10),
  958:     io:setopts(F2,[binary]),
  959:     Second10 = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_chars(F2,'',10),unicode,latin1),
  960:     file:close(F2),
  961:     LineBreakFileName =  filename:join([PrivDir, "testdata.dat"]),
  962:     LineBreakTestData = <<TestData/binary,$\n>>,
  963:     LineBreakTestDataList = binary_to_list(LineBreakTestData),
  964:     file:write_file(LineBreakFileName,[LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,TestData]),
  965:     {ok, F3} = file:open(LineBreakFileName,[read]),
  966:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
  967:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
  968:     LineBreakTestData =  unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
  969:     io:setopts(F3,[list]),
  970:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
  971:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
  972:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
  973:     eof = io:get_line(F3,''),
  974:     file:close(F3),
  975: 
  976:     %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  977:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  978: 	new ->
  979: 	    rtnode:run(
  980:               [{putline, "2."},
  981:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  982:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  983:                {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
  984:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  985:                {putline, "hej"},
  986:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  987:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
  988:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  989:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  990:                {putline, "hej"},
  991:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
  992:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  993:                {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
  994:                {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
  995:               ],[]);
  996:         _ ->
  997:             ok
  998:     end,
  999:     %% And one with oldshell
 1000:     rtnode:run(
 1001:       [{putline, "2."},
 1002:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1003:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1004:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1005:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1006:        {putline, "hej"},
 1007:        {expect, "[\n ]\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1008:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1009:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1010:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1011:        {putline, "hej"},
 1012:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1013:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1014:        {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1015:        {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1016:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
 1017:     ok.
 1018: 
 1019: answering_machine1(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->
 1020:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1021:     TestDataUtf = binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1)),
 1022:     TestDataLine1Oct = "\\\\345( \b)*\\\\344( \b)*\\\\366",
 1023:     rtnode:run(
 1024:       [{putline,""},
 1025:        {putline, "2."},
 1026:        {expect, "2"},
 1027:        {putline, "io:getopts()."},
 1028:        {expect, ">"},
 1029:        {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},
 1030:        {expect, "<"},
 1031:        %% get_line
 1032:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1033:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1034:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1035:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1036:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1037:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1038:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1039:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1040:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1041:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1042:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1043:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1044:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1045:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1046:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1047:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1048:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1049:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1050:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1051:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1052:        %% get_chars
 1053:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1054:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1055:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1056:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1057:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1058:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1059:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1060:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1061:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1062:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1063:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1064:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1065:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1066:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1067:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1068:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1069:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1070:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1071:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1072:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1073:        %% fread
 1074:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1075:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1076:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1077:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1078:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1079:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1080:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1081:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1082:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1083:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1084:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1085:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1086:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1087:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1088:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1089:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1090:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1091:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1092:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1093:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1094: 
 1095:       ],Me,"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
 1096:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
 1097:     O ! {self(),done},
 1098:     ok.
 1099:

 1179: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1180: read_modes_ogl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1181:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1182: 	noshell ->
 1183: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1184: 	_ ->
 1185: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine2)
 1186:     end.
 1187: 
 1188: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1189: read_modes_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1190:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1191: 	noshell ->
 1192: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1193: 	old ->
 1194: 	    {skipped,"No new shell"};
 1195: 	_ ->
 1196: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine1)
 1197:     end.
 1198: 
 1199: read_modes_gl_1(_Config,Machine) ->
 1200:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1201:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1202:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = list_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1203: 
 1204:     N2List = peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1205:     MyNodeList = atom2list(node()),
 1206:     register(io_proto_suite,self()),
 1207:     AM1 = spawn(?MODULE,Machine,
 1208: 		[MyNodeList, "io_proto_suite", N2List]),
 1209: 
 1210:     GL = receive X when is_pid(X) -> X end,
 1211:     ?dbg({group_leader,X}),
 1212:     %% get_line
 1213:     receive after 500 -> ok end, % Dont clash with the new shell...
 1214:     "Hej\n" = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1215:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1216:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1217:     <<"Hej\n">> = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1218:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1219:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1220:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1221:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1222:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1223:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1224: 
 1225:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1226:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1227:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1228:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1229:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1230:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1231: 
 1232:     %%get_chars
 1233:     "Hej" = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1234:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1235:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1236:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1237:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1238:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1239:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1240:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1241:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1242:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1243: 
 1244:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1245:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1246:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1247:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1248:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1249:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1250:     %%fread
 1251:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1252:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1253:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1254:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1255:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1256:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1257:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1258:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1259:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1260:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1261:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1262:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1263:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1264:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1265:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1266:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1267: 
 1268: 
 1269:     receive
 1270: 	{AM1,done} ->
 1271: 	    ok
 1272:     after 5000 ->
 1273: 	    exit(timeout)
 1274:     end,
 1275:     ok.
 1276: 
 1277: 
 1278: %% Test behaviour when reading broken Unicode files
 1279: broken_unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1280:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1281:     Latin1Name = filename:join([Dir,"latin1_data_file.dat"]),
 1282:     Utf8Name = filename:join([Dir,"utf8_data_file.dat"]),
 1283:     Latin1Data = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255)++[255,255,255])),
 1284:     Utf8Data = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1285: 		 lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255))),
 1286:     file:write_file(Latin1Name,Latin1Data),
 1287:     file:write_file(Utf8Name,Utf8Data),
 1288:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1289:     [ utf8 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Utf8Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1290:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf16) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1291:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf32) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1292:     ok.
 1293: 
 1294: 
 1295: %%
 1296: %% From the cookbook, more or less
 1297: heuristic_encoding_file2(FileName,Chunk,Enc) ->
 1298:     {ok,F} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
 1299:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1300: 
 1301: loop_through_file2(_,eof,_,Enc) ->
 1302:     Enc;
 1303: loop_through_file2(_,{error,_Err},_,_) ->
 1304:     latin1;
 1305: loop_through_file2(F,Bin,Chunk,Enc) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1306:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1307: 
 1308: %% Test eof before newline on stdin when erlang is in pipe.
 1309: eof_on_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1310:     case {ct:get_progname(),os:type()} of
 1311: 	{Erl,{unix,linux}} ->
 1312: 	    %% Not even Linux is reliable - echo can be both styles
 1313: 	    try
 1314: 		EchoLine = case os:cmd("echo -ne \"test\\ntest\"") of
 1315: 			       "test\ntest" ->
 1316: 				   "echo -ne \"a\\nbu\" | ";
 1317: 			       _ ->
 1318: 				   case os:cmd("echo \"test\\ntest\\c\"") of
 1319: 				       "test\ntest" ->
 1320: 					   "echo \"a\\nbu\\c\" | ";
 1321: 				       _ ->
 1322: 					   throw(skip)
 1323: 				   end
 1324: 			   end,
 1325: 		CommandLine1 = EchoLine ++
 1326: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1327: 		    "'io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1328: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1329: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1330: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine1) of
 1331: 		    "\"a\\n\"\"bu\"eof" ->
 1332: 			ok;
 1333: 		    Other1 ->
 1334: 			exit({unexpected1,Other1})
 1335: 		end,
 1336: 		CommandLine2 = EchoLine ++
 1337: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1338: 		    "'io:setopts([binary]),io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1339: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1340: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1341: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine2) of
 1342: 		    "<<\"a\\n\">><<\"bu\">>eof" ->
 1343: 			ok;
 1344: 		    Other2 ->
 1345: 			exit({unexpected2,Other2})
 1346: 		end
 1347: 	    catch
 1348: 		throw:skip ->
 1349: 		    {skipped,"unsupported echo program"}
 1350: 	    end;
 1351: 	{_,_} ->
 1352: 	    {skipped,"Only on linux"}
 1353:     end.
 1354: 
 1355: raw_stdout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1356:     Cmd = lists:append(
 1357:             [ct:get_progname(),
 1358:              " -noshell -noinput",
 1359:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1360:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " write_raw_to_stdout"]),
 1361:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
 1362:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof]),
 1363:     Expected = lists:seq(0,255),
 1364:     Expected = get_all_port_data(Port, []),
 1365:     Port ! {self(), close},
 1366:     ok.
 1367: 
 1368: get_all_port_data(Port, Acc) ->
 1369:     receive
 1370:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 1371:             get_all_port_data(Port, [Acc|Data]);
 1372:         {Port, eof} ->
 1373:             lists:flatten(Acc)
 1374:     end.
 1375: 
 1376: write_raw_to_stdout() ->
 1377:     try
 1378:         ok = io:setopts(standard_io, [{encoding, latin1}]),
 1379:         ok = file:write(standard_io, lists:seq(0,255)),
 1380:         halt(0)
 1381:     catch
 1382:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 1383:             io:format(standard_error, "~p~p~p", [Class, Reason, StackTrace]),
 1384:             halt(17)
 1385:     end.
 1386: 
 1387: raw_stdout_isatty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1388:     rtnode:run(
 1389:         [{putline,"io:setopts(group_leader(), [{encoding, latin1}])."},
 1390:          {putline,"file:write(group_leader(),[90, 127, 128, 255, 131, 90, 10])."},%
 1391:          {expect, "\\QZ^?\\200\\377\\203Z\\E"}
 1392:         ],[]),
 1393:         ok.
 1394: %%
 1395: %% Test I/O-server
 1396: %%
 1397: 
 1398: start_io_server_proxy() ->
 1399:     spawn_link(?MODULE,io_server_proxy,[#state{}]).
 1400: 
 1401: proxy_getall(Pid) ->
 1402:     req(Pid,{self(),getall}).
 1403: proxy_setnext(Pid,Data) when is_list(Data) ->
 1404:     req(Pid,{self(),next,Data}).
 1405: proxy_quit(Pid) ->
 1406:     req(Pid,{self(),quit}).
 1407: 
 1408: req(Pid,Mess) ->
 1409:     Pid ! Mess,
 1410:     receive
 1411: 	{Pid, Answer} ->
 1412: 	    Answer
 1413:     after 5000 ->
 1414: 	    exit(timeout)
 1415:     end.
 1416: 
 1417: io_server_proxy(State) -> 
 1418:     receive
 1419:         {io_request, From, ReplyAs, Request} ->
 1420:             case request(Request,State) of
 1421:                 {Tag, Reply, NewState} when Tag =:= ok; Tag =:= error ->
 1422:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1423:                     io_server_proxy(NewState);
 1424:                 {stop, Reply, _NewState} ->
 1425:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1426:                     exit(Reply)
 1427:             end;
 1428:         %% Private message
 1429:         {From, next, Data} ->
 1430:             From ! {self(), ok},
 1431:             io_server_proxy(State#state{nxt = Data});
 1432:         {From, getall} ->
 1433:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1434:             io_server_proxy(State#state{q=[]});
 1435:         {From, quit} ->
 1436:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1437: 	    ok;
 1438:         _Unknown ->
 1439:             io_server_proxy(State)
 1440:     end.
 1441: 
 1442: reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply) ->
 1443:     From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, Reply}.
 1444: 
 1445: request({put_chars, Encoding, Chars}, State) ->
 1446:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Chars} | State#state.q ]}};
 1447: request({put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args}, State) ->
 1448:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args} | 
 1449: 			    State#state.q ]}};
 1450: request({get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As}, State) ->
 1451:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, q = [{get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As} | State#state.q]}};
 1452: request({get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N}, State) ->
 1453:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1454: 									   q = [{get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N} |
 1455: 										State#state.q]}};
 1456: request({get_line, Encoding, Prompt}, State) ->
 1457:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), 
 1458:      State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1459: 		 q = [{get_line, Encoding, Prompt} | 
 1460: 		      State#state.q]}};
 1461: request({get_geomentry,_}, State) ->
 1462:     {error, {error,enotsup}, State};
 1463: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, false}]; Opts =:= [list] ->
 1464:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = list}};
 1465: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, true}]; Opts =:= [binary] ->
 1466:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = binary}};
 1467: request(getopts, State) ->
 1468:     {ok, case State#state.mode of
 1469: 	     list -> [{binary,false}];
 1470: 	     binary -> [{binary, true}]
 1471: 	 end, State#state{q=[getopts | State#state.q ]}};
 1472: request({requests, Reqs}, State) ->
 1473:     multi_request(Reqs, {ok, ok, State}).
 1474: 
 1475: multi_request([R|Rs], {ok, _Res, State}) ->
 1476:     multi_request(Rs, request(R, State));
 1477: multi_request([_|_], Error) ->
 1478:     Error;
 1479: multi_request([], State) ->
 1480:     State.
 1481: 
 1482: convert(Atom,_,_) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1483:     Atom;
 1484: convert(Data, unicode, list) ->
 1485:     unicode:characters_to_list(Data,unicode);
 1486: convert(Data, latin1, list) ->
 1487:     try
 1488: 	L = unicode:characters_to_list(Data, unicode),
 1489: 	[ true = Ch =< 255 || Ch <- L ],
 1490: 	L
 1491:     catch
 1492: 	_:_ ->
 1493: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1494:     end;
 1495: convert(Data, unicode, binary) ->
 1496:     unicode:characters_to_binary(Data,unicode,unicode);
 1497: convert(Data, latin1, binary) ->
 1498:     case unicode:characters_to_binary(Data, unicode, latin1) of
 1499: 	Bin when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1500: 	    Bin;
 1501: 	_ ->
 1502: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1503:     end.
 1504: 
 1505: atom2list(A) ->
 1506:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w", [A])).
 1507: 
 1508: chomp([]) ->
 1509:     [];
 1510: chomp([$\n]) ->
 1511:     [];
 1512: chomp([H|T]) ->
 1513:     [H|chomp(T)];
 1514: chomp(<<>>) ->
 1515:     <<>>;
 1516: chomp(<<$\n>>) ->
 1517:     <<>>;
 1518: chomp(<<Ch,Rest/binary>>) ->
 1519:     X = chomp(Rest),
 1520:     <<Ch,X/binary>>;
 1521: chomp(Atom) ->
 1522:     Atom.
 1523: 
 1524: do(Fun) ->
 1525:     {_,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 1526: 				    exit(Fun())
 1527: 			    end),
 1528:     Ref.
 1529: 
 1530: done(Ref) ->
 1531:     receive
 1532: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Result} ->
 1533: 	    Result
 1534:     end.
